content: --आसद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} difficult to be approached or overtaken, unassailable, unconquerable; <ls>R. 3. 66</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 4</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2. 5</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">4. 15.</ls> {2} difficult to be found or met with. {3} unequalled, unparalleled. {4} hard to be borne, insupportable. (--दः an epithet of Śiva.
